abstract: Carly Fiorina makes significant progress in second Republican presidential primary debate toward offering credible rebuttal to Democrats' claims about Republican Party's so-called war on women; establishes herself as capable of assuming prominent, if not presidential or vice-presidential, leadership role in party due to her commanding performance at debate.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Fiorina’s solid debate performance on Wednesday could help lessen a problem that her party has struggled with: how to better entice female voters.

headline.main: Carly Fiorina Offers Republicans a Pathway to Reach Women
headline.print_headline: Fiorina Offers G.O.P. a Pathway to Reach Women

snippet: Mrs. Fiorina’s solid debate performance on Wednesday could help lessen a problem that her party has struggled with: how to better entice female voters.
